Content:
Why are you rejecting the task
I have to reject the task because of 
My current workload
A health issue
A high level of risk

Can you take on the task with more help
In that case it is 
Reasonable
Possible
Still impossible

Who else do you suggest to take on this task
I suggest that the  can take on this task
Customer service staff
Senior designer
Intern

Why do you think so
This person can assist you by 
Sharing the workload
Coordinating with members
Doing reports

How can I improve for the next time assigning you a task
I hope that you will 
Give a brief in advance
Provide clear instructions
Be open to feedback

What information do you need before taking on a task
I need to know  before taking on the task
The expected outcome
A clear scope of work
References

What remarkable achievements have you had in the past year
I am proud to say that I have 
Sucessfully led a major project
Proposed a better process
Exceeded my sales target

How has that impacted the business performance
It has 
Impressed our client
Improved efficiencyby thirty percent
Increased the revenue by twenty percent

What is your long-term goal in the company
My long-term goal in the company is 
To continously develop my skills
The leadership position
The job specialization

How much of a raise do you want
I believe a raise of thirty percent would be 
Approciate
Justified
Adequate

Where did you get this number from
This number is based on
The industry standards for my position
My performance avaluation
My current responsibilities

What do you think caused the issue between us
Firstly I felt like the issue comes from
Different working styles
Unclear goals
Confusion over roles

What impact does it have on you
It makes me
Feel unguided
Lose my motivation
Feel left out

How do you think we can resolve together
Well I think the fisrt step is to
Clarify our roles
Improve communication channels
Seek outside perspectives

How do you think it works
It allows us to
Improve our workflow
Overcome communication barriers
Establish clear goals

How can we improve our communication
I think it would be helpful if we
Practice active listening 
Use more visual aids
Learn from our mistakes

Can you walk me through what happened
I messed up last time by 
Making an inaccurate payment
Overlooking the payment due date
Leaving out the payment

Can you be more specific about the step you missed
I did not 
Verify the data
Review the contract terms
Obtain the necessary approvals

What is the underlying reason behind this
I have not  yet
Established a reliable payment process
Adopted an efficient payment process
Created a checklist to ensure accuracy

Do you understand the consequences of your actions
I know my errors can hurt 
The company's reputation
The project timeline
The relationship with our partners

How would you solve the issua at hand
I would  to prevent similar mistakes from happening again
Seek advice from my senior colleagues
Implement stricter quality control measures
Emforce greater accountability

How would it work
This solution would help to 
Make actionable changes based on inputs
Prioritize accuracy
Cultivate a sense of ownership

What brings you to my office today
I came to discuss an issue that I noticed with 
Our revenue targets
Our team's performance
Our sales figures

Are there any concerns or problems wiht the KPIs
The targets seems to be 
Overly optimistic
Unattainable
Unrealistic

What does it have to do with your team
It causes the staff to feel like they are 
Fighting a tough battle
Working very hard for little gain
Struggling to succeed

Have you considered if the issue here is your team's work process
I have  it bit our process is not the root cause
Extensively reviewed
Closely analyzed
Attentively considered

What do you think about "no pressure no diamonds"
It should  to this circumstance
Be modified
Not be applied blindly

How do you suggest we address this issue
I think it is important to 
Modify the KPIs to account for unforeseen challenges
Revise our sales goals for this quarter
Reassess our current strategies

Does it mean you would fail to meet overall business goals
I would also  to mitigate the negative impacts
Priortize high-value customers
Encourage cross-selling
Encourage upselling

Can you tell me how you got this number
Sure I got this number by 
Using data analysis
Increasing the average revenue per order
Strategiacally promoting our product

What data source did you use for your calculations
I used  for the calculations
The most updated data
The sales reports
The analytics data from our website

Have you cross-checked with the parties involved
I have cross-checked with 
The heads of our department
Consumers
Team members

Then why does it not match with the data from the relevant parties
The difference comes from 
Different design preference
Conflicting goals
Contrasting user feedback

Are you aware of the consequences of cheating
I am aware that cheating can cause 
Financial penalties
Harm to our reputation
My job termination

How much time do you need to recalculate this number
I would need  to recalculate this number accurately
A couple hours
Some time
Around two days
